com.github.nfcforandroid.api.client

Interface INfaBeam<Record extends INfaRecord>

  • Type Parameters:
    Record - the type of record to passed through beam

    public interface INfaBeam<Record extends INfaRecord>
    Author:
    jefBinomed Interface which defines the methods to use for using beam protocol This interface is to use when you want to do beam communication.
    See Also:
    NfaWriteBean, INfaIntentWrite

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAndroidApplicationRecord() 
      void beamCallBack()
      This method tells to the client that the beam action was welled finish.
      java.util.List<NfaWriteBean<Record>> getWriters()
      Gives the list of NfaWriteBean used for writing datas, you could This method is called when the beam action is being initiate by android framework

    • Method Detail

      • getWriters

        java.util.List<NfaWriteBean<Record>> getWriters()
        Gives the list of NfaWriteBean used for writing datas, you could This method is called when the beam action is being initiate by android framework
        Returns:
        a list of NfaWriteBean, an empty list if no writers are available

      • beamCallBack

        void beamCallBack()
        This method tells to the client that the beam action was welled finish. This method is called when the beam transfert is finish

      • addAndroidApplicationRecord

        boolean addAndroidApplicationRecord()
        Returns:
        true if you want to add the AndroidApplicationRecord to your Ndef message. false else.
